anya-e0801n0:65_0: 1. Dve dvekā-nekesu nāmasmā si yo, aṁ yo, nā hi, sa naṁ, smā hi, sa naṁ, smiṁ su.
anya-e0801n0:323_0: 8. Ore pari vati pāre majjhe heṭṭhuddhā dhonto vā chaṭṭhiyā.
anya-e0801n0:338_0: 18. Tattha gahetvā tena paharitvā yuddhe sarūpaṁ.
anya-e0801n0:466_0: 27. Tamassa sippaṁ sīlaṁ paṇyaṁ paharaṇaṁ payojanaṁ.
anya-e0801n0:468_1: Tena kataṁ kītaṁ baddhamabhisaṅkhataṁ saṁsaṭṭhaṁ hataṁ hanti jitaṁ jayati dibbati khaṇati tarati carati vahati jīvati.
anya-e0801n0:505_0: 59. Tassa bhāvakammesu tta tā ttana ṇya ṇeyyaṇiya ṇiyā.
anya-e0801n0:512_0: 66. Tassa vikārāvayavesu ṇa ṇika ṇeyya mayā.
anya-e0801n0:586_0: 127. Kosajjājjava pārisajja sohajja maddavārissāsabhājañña theyya bāhusaccā.
anya-e0801n0:663_0: 58. Ṭhā-sa, vasa, silisa, sī, ruha, jara, janīhi.
anya-e0801n0:666_0: 61. Tuṁ tāye tave bhāve bhavissati kriyāyaṁ tadatthāyaṁ.
anya-e0801n0:729_0: 124. Disassa passa dassa dasa da dakkhā.
anya-e0801n0:787_0: 1. Vattamāne ti anti, si tha, mi ma, te ante, se vhe, e mhe.
anya-e0801n0:788_0: 2. Bhavissati ssati ssanti, ssasi ssatha, ssāmi ssāma, ssate ssante, ssase ssavhe, ssaṁ ssāmhe.
anya-e0801n0:790_0: 4. Bhūte ī uṁ, o ttha, iṁ mhā, ā ū, se vhaṁ, a mhe.
anya-e0801n0:791_0: 5. Anajjatane ā ū, o ttha, a mhā, ttha tthuṁ, se vhaṁ, iṁ muse.
anya-e0801n0:792_0: 6. Parokkhe a u, e ttha, a mha, ttha re, ttho vho, i mhe.
anya-e0801n0:793_1: Eyyādo vā tipattiyaṁ ssā ssaṁsu, sse ssatha, ssaṁ ssāmhā, ssatha ssiṁsu, ssase ssavhe, ssiṁ ssāmhase.
anya-e0801n0:794_0: 8. Hetuphalesveyya eyyuṁ, eyyāsi eyyātha, eyyāmi eyyāma, etha eraṁ, etho eyyāvho, eyyaṁ eyyāmhe.
anya-e0801n0:796_0: 10. Tu antu, hi tha, mima, taṁ antaṁ, ssu vho, e āmadhasa.
anya-e0801n0:836_0: 50. Atthiteyyādicchannaṁ sa su sa satha saṁ sāma.
anya-e0801n0:867_0: 1. Cara dara kara raha jana sana tala sāda sādha kasāsa caṭā ya vāhi ṇu.
anya-e0801n0:868_1: Bhara mara cara tara ara gara hana tana mana bhama kita dhana baṁha kambamba cakkha bhikkha saṁkindanda yaja paṭāṇāsa vasa pasa paṁsa bandhā u.
anya-e0801n0:871_0: 5. Tapusa vidha kura putha mudā ku.
anya-e0801n0:876_0: 10. Vapa vara vasa rasa nabha hara hana paṇā īṇa.
anya-e0801n0:881_0: 14. I bhī kā karāra vaka saka vāhi ko.
anya-e0801n0:899_0: 32. Aja vaja muda gada gamā gaka.
anya-e0801n0:911_0: 43. Asa masa vasa kuca kacā cho.
anya-e0801n0:929_0: 60. Tija kasa tasa dakkhā kiṇo jassa kho ca.
anya-e0801n0:940_0: 70. Dhāhisi tana jana jara gama sacā tu.
anya-e0801n0:965_0: 95. Ruda khuda muda mada chida sūda sapa kamā daka.
anya-e0801n0:971_0: 101. Varāra kara tara dara yamaajja mithasakā kuno.
anya-e0801n0:987_0: 116. Khipa supa nī sū pūhi paka.
anya-e0801n0:995_0: 124. Kara sara sala kala valla vasā abho.
anya-e0801n0:1007_0: 136. Khī su vī yā gā hi sā lū khu hu mara dhara kara ghara jamā ma sāmā mo.
anya-e0801n0:1015_0: 143. Khī si sinī sī su vī ku sū hi raka.
anya-e0801n0:1019_0: 147. Mandaṅka sasā sa ma dha catā uro.
anya-e0801n0:1041_0: 169. Sara vasa kalā kīro vassuṭa ca.
anya-e0801n0:1054_0: 182. Maṅga kama samba saba saka vasa visa keva kala palla kaṭha paṭa kuṇḍa maṇḍā alo.
anya-e0801n0:1061_0: 189. Ana sana kala kuka saṭha mahā ilo.
anya-e0801n0:1085_0: 213. Sasāsa vasa visa hana vana manāna kamā so.
anya-e0801n0:1089_0: 217. Ve tā ta yu panā la kala camā aso.
anya-e0801n0:1090_0: 218. Vaya diva kara kare hya saṇasakapāsa kasā.
anya-e0801n0:1097_0: 225. Khī mi pī cu mā vā kāhi ḷo ussa vā dīgho ca.
